business.name: VAGCODEPRO
business.short_tagline: Coding, retrofits and diagnostics for VAG group vehicles.
business.description: VAGCODEPRO is a small, specialized automotive service focused on coding, retrofits and diagnostics for vehicles from the VAG group (Volkswagen, Audi, Škoda, SEAT). The business is built as an independent garage-style service with a professional but down-to-earth, authentic approach. It emphasizes correct, safe and clean work rather than flashy tuning for social media.

main_services: ECU coding and feature activation for VAG group vehicles
Retrofit of OEM features (e.g. reverse camera, auto hold, comfort functions)
Diagnostics and fault-code reading/reset for VAG models
Parameter adjustments and customization via diagnostic tools (where legally and technically safe)
planned_services: More advanced coding and feature enablement using ODIS
Deeper integration with VCDS and OBDeleven for detailed diagnostics and logging
Broader range of VAG retrofits as experience and equipment grow
example_retrofits: Reverse camera retrofit on Audi A3 8V (2020)
Auto hold function activation on Audi A3 8V (2020)

target_vehicles: Other VAG group brands where supported by tools

founder.name: Milos
founder.professional_background: More than 5 years of experience in electronics-related work and over 2.5 years as a hardware development engineer. As of June 2025, Milos is the team leader for hardware development at MikroElektronika.
founder.relevance_to_business: Strong electronics and hardware background provides a deep understanding of automotive electronics, ECUs and embedded systems, which supports safe and reliable coding and retrofit work.
founder.current_daily_job: Hardware Development Team Lead at MikroElektronika

location.workspace_description: Private garage being prepared as a small but clean and organized workshop for VAG coding and retrofits.

planned_improvements: Floor finishing suitable for workshop use
garage_status.goal: Finish the interior of the garage (power, walls, floor) before actively pushing Instagram content and officially launching the service profile.

demo_vehicle.usage: Main demo and test vehicle for coding, retrofits and content creation.
example_content: Reverse camera retrofit on Audi A3 8V (before/after, wiring, coding)
Auto hold activation and explanation of how it works
Showcasing diagnostic sessions and feature checks

diagnostic_software_and_tools.goal: Build a stable, legal and reliable toolchain for VAG diagnostics, coding and retrofits.

computer_setup.current: ThinkPad T14s (Windows-based, chosen for compatibility with VAG diagnostic tools).
computer_setup.previous: MacBook M2 (sold or being replaced because of poor compatibility with diagnostic software).

planned_purpose: Present services (coding, retrofits, diagnostics) in a clear, technical but understandable way.
Showcase portfolio: before/after retrofits, case studies, customer stories.
Provide contact information and booking options.
Educate customers on what VAG coding and retrofits are, what is safe, and what is not.

email.planned: contact@vagcode.rs (to be used once the business is more established and the need arises).

instagram.goal: Professional-looking profile that still feels like a real garage service, not a corporate brand.
content_type: Short technical explanations of coding and retrofits.
Before/after posts of specific retrofits (e.g., reverse camera, auto hold, comfort functions).
Showcasing diagnostic sessions, coding screens and in-car results.
Educational posts explaining what each feature does and when it makes sense to retrofit it.
visual_style: Photos and videos taken in the garage, around the car, laptop screens, diagnostic tools.
Clean, simple visuals without over-edited or flashy elements.
Focus on authenticity and clarity over aesthetics only.

text_style.tone: Professional and technically precise, but natural and human – like a serious garage that knows what it is doing.
constraints: Avoid overly salesy or cringe language.
text_style.language: Primarily Serbian for local audience, but flexible depending on post type.
text_style.vibe: Authentic small garage, transparent, honest and focused on doing the job right.

car_advertisement.description: VAGCODEPRO branding and website URL (vagcodepro.rs) placed as an advertisement on Milos’ own Audi A3 8V.
car_advertisement.effect: Already attracting attention on the street and acting as a moving billboard for the business.

content_strategy.launch_timing: Official IG launch planned roughly 1–2 months after the garage interior is finished and presentable.
principles: Show real work on real cars.
Explain what was done, not just show the result.
Teach the audience while also promoting services.

short_term_goals: Finish the garage interior and workspace setup.
Stabilize diagnostic tools and software stack.
Prepare Instagram profile with proper headline, description, and consistent visual style.
Create first few high-quality retrofit and coding case posts.
mid_term_goals: Build a small but loyal local client base for VAG coding and retrofits.
Expand service list with more retrofits and advanced coding.
Use website and social media to position VAGCODEPRO as a go-to local expert for VAG electronic upgrades.

identity.privacy: Milos prefers not to make himself a public face in the same way he avoids showing his face in other technical videos/projects. Focus remains on the car and the work.

communication_style.preferred_style: Clear, technical, confident, calm and honest.
